rows.label: tev001692_MSG0001
rows.name: They call these Skells "Yellow Hammers."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001692_MSG0002
rows.name:
Okay, a mechanic named Matthew calls them that.
Aaaaand it hasn't really caught on at all.
But it's still pretty cool.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001692_MSG0003
rows.name:
Apparently the two-wheeled type is too underpowered
for construction work, so they use a four-wheel model.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001692_MSG0005
rows.name:
In other respects, it's basically identical to the models
used by BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001692_MSG0006
rows.name:
But they paint it a different color, and of course give it
a bunch of industrial attachments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001692_MSG0007
rows.name:
Still, if you remove the attachments and revert it to its
initial configuration, you can equip it with BLADE
Skell weapons, no sweat![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001692_MSG0008
rows.name: Furthermore—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001692_JNK0010
rows.name: Interrupt

rows.label: tev001692_SEL0011
rows.name: Stop Alexa before she says another word about Skells.

rows.label: tev001692_JNK0020
rows.name: Admire

rows.label: tev001692_SEL0021
rows.name: Express admiration for Alexa's expertise in this topic.

rows.label: tev001692_MSG0009
rows.name: Huh? Oh, I'm sorry![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001692_MSG0010
rows.name: I was rambling, wasn't I?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001692_MSG0011
rows.name:
When you listen to the older mechanics talk,
they have a story about every nut and bolt.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001692_MSG0012
rows.name:
You're right, though. The excitement from Skells should
come from using them, not talking about them.
Because using them is so important. ...Skells, that is.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001692_JNK0110
rows.name: Interrupt

rows.label: tev001692_SEL0111
rows.name: Stop Alexa before she says another word about Skells.

rows.label: tev001692_JNK0120
rows.name: Admire

rows.label: tev001692_SEL0121
rows.name: Express admiration for Alexa's expertise in this topic.

rows.label: tev001692_MSG0013
rows.name: Gya! I did it again! Sorry! Sorry. So very sorry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001692_MSG0014
rows.name:
Er, so did you want something from me?
Is that why you're here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001692_MSG0015
rows.name: Oh, drat! That's right![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001692_MSG0016
rows.name:
I promised Tika I'd help her test that new weapon
after this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001692_MSG0017
rows.name:
If I keep geeking out on these Skells, I'll never make
it in time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001692_MSG0018
rows.name: Sorry, but we'll have to continue this later. Bye![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001692_MSG0019
rows.name: Is that sarcasm? Are you making fun of me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001692_MSG0020
rows.name:
You know what? I don't even care. I WANT you to
know why I get so excited about this sort of thing![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001692_MSG0021
rows.name: I've enjoyed every day since we landed here on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001692_MSG0022
rows.name:
Yes, we have a lot to learn, people get angry at me,
lives are in danger, the Ganglion are a buncha jerks,
and blah blah blah. I get it. All that sucks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001692_MSG0023
rows.name: But—oh, drat! That's right![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001692_MSG0024
rows.name:
I promised Tika I'd help her test that new weapon
after this![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001692_MSG0025
rows.name: Sorry, but we'll have to continue this later. Bye![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001692_MSG0026
rows.name: What? Oh no. I'm really not that good at this stuff.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001692_MSG0027
rows.name:
I'm still learning, you know? I couldn't possibly keep up
with any of the veteran mechanics.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001692_MSG0028
rows.name:
Still, I've enjoyed every single day since we landed here
on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001692_MSG0029
rows.name:
Yes, we have a lot to learn, people get angry at me,
lives are in danger, the Ganglion are a buncha jerks,
and blah blah blah. I get it. All that sucks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001692_MSG0030
rows.name:
But I've never been this excited about anything before,
and that drives me to work as hard as I can.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001692_MSG0031
rows.name: Oh, whoops![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001692_MSG0032
rows.name:
I promised Tika I'd help her test that new weapon
after this![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001692_MSG0033
rows.name: She'll be furious if I'm late.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001692_MSG0034
rows.name:
Sorry I spent this whole time talking your ear off.
Next time, I'll give you a chance to talk![ST:wait ]
